response: {"message": "Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which we believe would greatly benefit you. Given its value and quality, we're confident it's worth more than what others might be willing to pay. Considering its worth to you and the market value, we propose a price of $120 for this product. We believe this is a fair deal that respects both the value of the product and your budget. Please let us know if this offer suits your needs.", "product_price": 120}
